properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM V_CHLNG_MISSION_LIST WHERE CHLNG_FL = 'N'
SELECT* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, V.* FROM (SELECT * FROM V_CHLNG_MISSION_LIST WHERE CHLNG_FL = 'N' ORDER BY CHLNG_NO DESC) V ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT * FROM V_CHLNG_MISSION_LIST WHERE CHLNG_NO = ? AND CHLNG_FL = 'N'
INSERT INTO CHALLENGE_MISSION VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, ?, ?)
